graderInstructions.title: Instructions for filling the graders
graderInstructions.content:
Grader 1 must be a University of Helsinki professor, assistant or associate professor, research director, senior university lecturer or university lecturer.

 Grader 2 must be a doctor. Grader 2 can be a person outside the University of Helsinki.
 To enter the details of the external assessor, click 'Add external grader'.
